name: Wii Sports Free Roam
description:
Have you ever played Wii Sports resort and wished you could see more of the tropical paradise that is Wuhu Island?

Well now you can! With this brand new experience, you can travel anywhere you want on Wuhu Island.

(THIS GAME IS VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT! THINGS WILL CHANGE DOWN THE ROAD!)

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Esc - Pause Menu

If you ever get stuck while playing you can hit the "respawn" button and you'll go back to spawn.
